core_meaning.legge_1899_public_domain: Sui indicates that (under its conditions) there will be great progress and success. But it will be advantageous to be firm and correct. There will (then) be no error.
core_meaning.normalized_summary: Following done well is not blind obedience. You align yourself with what is right, and others then align with you. Progress comes from choosing worthy guidance and holding to correct conduct.

translations.text: The first NINE, undivided, shows us one changing the object of his pursuit; but if he be firm and correct, there will be good fortune. Going beyond (his own) gate to find associates, he will achieve merit.
初九：官有渝，貞吉。出門交有功。

lines.normalized_meaning: You pivot. You shift who/what you follow. As long as you stay principled and seek allies beyond your own gate, that change earns real credit.

translations.text: The second SIX, divided, shows us one who cleaves to the little boy, and lets go the man of age and experience.

lines.normalized_meaning: If you attach yourself to someone immature, you lose the seasoned, reliable ally. Favoring the small costs you the strong.

translations.text: The third SIX, divided, shows us one who cleaves to the man of age and experience, and lets go the little boy. Such following will get what it seeks; but it will be advantageous to adhere to what is firm and correct.
六三：系丈夫，失小子。隨有求得，利居貞。

lines.normalized_meaning: Following mature strength instead of childish influence brings results. Stay steady, stay upright, and you benefit.

translations.text: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows us one followed and obtaining (adherents). Though he be firm and correct, there will be evil. If he be sincere (however) in his course, and make that evident, into what error will he fall?
九四：隨有獲，貞凶。有孚在道，以明，何咎？

lines.normalized_meaning: Being followed gives you power — and risk. Even if you’re correct, jealousy and suspicion arise. Only visible sincerity and clarity of motive keeps you safe.

translations.text: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows us (the ruler) sincere in (fostering all) that is excellent. There will be good fortune.

lines.normalized_meaning: True leadership: wholehearted faith in what is genuinely good. When the center is sincere, good fortune follows.

translations.text: The topmost SIX, divided, shows us (that sincerity) firmly held and clung to, yea, and bound fast. (We see) the king with it presenting his offerings on the western mountain.
上六：拘系之，乃從維之。王用亨于西山。

lines.normalized_meaning: Following reaches ritual-level commitment: loyalty is bound, formal, consecrated under royal authority. Devotion becomes duty.
